mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, AA.* FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY POSTID DESC) AA) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (POSTID, SUBJECT, USERNAME, CONTENT, NOTICE, IP, USERID) VALUES (BOARD_POSTID_SEQ.nextval, #{subject}, #{userName}, #{content}, #{notice}, #{ip}, #{userID})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE notice = 'true' ORDER BY POSTID DESC
